title: Ram ropui tak lo thleng tur kan nghah van piahan a awm a
lyrics:
Ram ropui tak lo thleng tur kan nghah van piahan a awm a,
Tah chuan mi thianghlim kum tinin an pung e;
Ni lo kiam sawt emten chu ram lo thlen chu a tihnai a,
Pathian ram lo thlen chu ahnai tawh em e.

Aw, Pathian ram lo thlen chu a hnai tawh hle, (2)
Aw ka rilru inpeih rawh, tawtawrawtin min ko dawn e,
Lalpa chu ropuiin a lo lang ang.

Pathian ram lo thlen leh a ropui an buatsaih beiseina,
Leh kan Lal lo lang tur kha lo thlir lawkin;
Chu chuan khawvel suala kan tang tawh kha min lo tlan chhuak a,
Pathian ram lo thlen chu a hnai tawh em e.

Pathian ram a lo thlenin kan Lalpa duh tak kan hmu an g,
Ram lan hmain kan Lal chu lang tur a ni;
Haleluia! A thisena min tlantu hming i fak ang,
Pathian ram lo thlen chu a hnai tawh em e.

Khawvel hian a nghah rei avangin a lo ngui zo ta a,
Mite thinlung pawh a beidawng hial ta e;
Pathian ram chanchin i hril ang u, hlain kai harh ila,
Pathian ram lo thlen chu a hnai tawh em e.
